You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a part of a kitchen with modern appliances. There is a white refrigerator on the right, a white dishwasher below a dark granite countertop in the center, and a white electric range with an over-the-range microwave above it on the left. The floor is tiled, and there is a window with blinds in the background. The cabinets are white, and the walls are painted in a light color.

There is a built-in microwave and oven on the right, and a window with blinds above the sink on the left. Kitchen utensils are visible in a holder on the counter, and there are orange notes or labels on the cabinet doors and drawers. The floor is tiled, and the overall color scheme is white and gray with natural light coming in from the window.
